name: Copper Ore
description: Copper Ore is an early-gameMineralResource. It is widely used in the construction ofInterior Wood Building Pieces, and prospectors can make extensive use of copper once they reach level 20 and unlockTier 3, as it is a crucial component inElectronics. In the late game, copper is used in various deployables like theRefrigeratorand theMaterial Processor.
